module Documentation.Haddock (

  -- * Interface
  Interface(..),
  InstalledInterface(..),
  createInterfaces,
  processModules,

  -- * Export items & declarations
  ExportItem(..),
  DocForDecl,
  FnArgsDoc,

  -- * Cross-referencing
  LinkEnv,
  DocName(..),

  -- * Instances
  DocInstance,
  InstHead,

  -- * Documentation comments
  Doc,
  DocH(..),
  Example(..),
  Hyperlink(..),
  DocMarkup(..),
  Documentation(..),
  ArgMap,
  AliasMap,
  WarningMap,
  DocMap,
  HaddockModInfo(..),
  markup,

  -- * Interface files
  InterfaceFile(..),
  readInterfaceFile,
  nameCacheFromGhc,
  freshNameCache,
  NameCacheAccessor,

  -- * Flags and options
  Flag(..),
  DocOption(..),

  -- * Error handling
  HaddockException(..),

  -- * Program entry point
  haddock,
  haddockWithGhc,
  getGhcDirs,
  withGhc
) where


import Haddock.InterfaceFile
import Haddock.Interface
import Haddock.Types
import Haddock.Options
import Haddock.Utils
import Haddock


-- | Create 'Interface' structures from a given list of Haddock command-line
-- flags and file or module names (as accepted by 'haddock' executable).  Flags
-- that control documentation generation or show help or version information
-- are ignored.
createInterfaces
  :: [Flag]         -- ^ A list of command-line flags
  -> [String]       -- ^ File or module names
  -> IO [Interface] -- ^ Resulting list of interfaces
createInterfaces flags modules = do
  (_, ifaces, _) <- withGhc flags (readPackagesAndProcessModules flags modules)
  return ifaces
